engine.math

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.math.Vector2D

  • public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A Vector2D is an x and y coordinate in 2D space. It can be thought of as a direction with the target pointing towards x and y, and the origin at (0x, 0y). The length of the Vector2D is the distance between (0x, 0y) and the instance variables x, y. Vector2D objects can be used both as positions and as directions.
    Author:
    Michael
